des: "This is a spicy alternative to classic basil pesto.  You can control the spiciness by using less jalapeno and by removing the seeds and white membrane of the pepper before adding it to the pesto.  If you like the spice, just throw it all in!"
ins: Combine the cilantro, pine nuts, olive oil, garlic, lime juice, jalapeno pepper, and Parmesan cheese in a blender; pulse until the mixture reaches a soft, paste-like consistency.
